reviewText: I wish that everyone would see this and truly take to heart that we each have a responsibility in taking care of this place we call home.  No matter where we are, or who we are, we can each make a difference.

The Canadians are not David Attenborough and approach their journey south in a serious vein laced with moments of frivolous jollity. The photography is very good and the subtitles clear. This is an interesting and well researched account of a visit to Antarctica and is good value for money as well.
